onyomiExamples.meaning: picture, drawing, painting, sketch, image (TV, film, etc.), picture, footage
Western painting, Western film, Western movie

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to draw, to paint, to sketch, to depict, to describe, to picture in one's mind, to imagine, to form a certain shape (e.g. path of an action, appearance of an object, etc.)
